description:
Comprehensive Codebase Refactoring and Project Organization

Perform a complete refactoring of the project codebase to improve code quality, maintainability, and organizational structure.

Requirements:
- Analyze current project structure and identify organizational issues
- Create a logical folder/directory structure following industry best practices
- Group related files by feature, domain, or layer (components, services, utilities, etc.)
- Refactor code to follow consistent coding standards and conventions
- Remove duplicate code and extract reusable functions/components
- Improve naming conventions for files, folders, variables, and functions
- Separate concerns properly (business logic, presentation, data access)
- Add or improve code documentation and comments where needed
- Ensure proper module boundaries and reduce coupling between components
- Update import paths to reflect new structure
- Verify all functionality works after refactoring through testing

Organizational Goals:
- Clear separation between source code, tests, configuration, and assets
- Consistent file naming scheme throughout the project
- Logical grouping that makes code easy to find and navigate
- Scalable structure that accommodates future growth

Code Quality Goals:
- Eliminate code smells and anti-patterns
- Improve readability and maintainability
- Follow SOLID principles and design patterns where appropriate
- Ensure consistent code formatting and style
title: Passo inicial

tasks.description: Create Glass component consolidation directory structure
Audit and merge glass-button variants into unified component
Audit and merge glass-input variants into unified component
Audit and merge glass-checkbox variants into unified component
Audit and merge glass-card variants into unified component
Audit and merge glass-select variants into unified component
Audit and merge glass-textarea variants into unified component
Update all imports using old Glass component paths
Audit complaints data files to identify active/deprecated code
Consolidate complaint definitions into single source
Update all imports using old complaints data paths
Audit types in /types/ and /lib/types/ for overlap
Update all imports using lib/types paths
Run TypeScript type-check to verify no broken imports
Run build to verify compilation success
Verify application functionality with Playwright test
